Name: Core Passive: Guardian

When Ben launches a follow-up attack during his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members gain a Shield of <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> of his DEF +<color=#2BAD00>100</color>, lasting for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:

Cons.Name: Reacting Force
Cons.Effect: When successfully Blocking an enemy with Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the DMG dealt by the blocked enemy is reduced by 30% for 15s.

Cons.Name: Offense Through Defense
Cons.Effect: When successfully triggering a Block Counter during Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, inflict an additional 300% of Ben's DEF as DMG.

Cons.Name: Agile Adaptation
Cons.Effect: When successfully blocking enemy DMG with Ben's invulnerable effect during his <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the following counter deals 30% more DMG.

Cons.Name: Wild Spirit
Cons.Effect: After launching an attack or follow-up attack during Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, Daze inflicted by <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> is increased by 20%, lasting 12s.
